meaningMnemonic: You're tapping your <radical>fingers</radical> against a <radical>white</radical> wall when you realize the sound you're making is actually a sick <kanji>beat</kanji>. You keep going and start singing along. Boo boo boop. Boo do do do doop! Finger beats!
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>beat</kanji> is sick, but as you tap you realize you're <reading>hack</reading>ing (はく) up the wall! Slowly but surely, your fingers are hacking out little bits of the wall. And the beats don't sound as good until you move to a new, clean white area.
